A perfect combination of amenities, service, and location!
Steps from downtown San Jose with everything you need including Whole Foods, entertainment/nightlife, restaurants, Caltrain, and VTA light rail stops just across the street!
We also offer you peace of mind through Avalon Assurance, our 30 day move-in satisfaction guarantee.
From the moment you move in, we are here for you.

Avalon at Cahill Park offers spaciously designed homes that boast high ceilings, gourmet kitchens, central air conditioning and heating, walk-in closets, private patios and other quality details found throughout every floor plan.

We also offer luxurious features and amenities to make you as comfortable as possible, such as a sparkling swimming pool, spa, state of the art fitness center, and an entertaining recreation room and clubhouse.
Don't wait any longer to move into your dream home today!
Spacious third floor home with fully upgraded hardwood, Samsung stainless steel appliances, and a free VTA pass!
In-Unit Laundry Room With Full-Size Samsung Washer/Dryer
